ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.G.DE36Test delayed to next contact or referredReason Hepatitis C test not done - Test delayed to next contact or referred
HIV.G.DE37Stock-out or expiredReason Hepatitis C test not done - Stock-out or expired
HIV.G.DE38Machine or technician not available or machine not functioningReason Hepatitis C test not done - Machine or technician not available or machine not functioning
HIV.G.DE39Client declined / refused testReason Hepatitis C test not done - Client declined / refused test
HIV.G.DE40OtherReason Hepatitis C test not done - Other
